MoFA
Composable Agent Framework

A modular framework for building complex agentic workflows. From debate to research, MoFA orchestrates the flow of intelligence with ease.

Visit MoFa Website

Explore the full capabilities of the MoFa Agent Framework.

mofa.ai

Why Choose MoFA

Composable Agent Architecture

Build complex AI applications by connecting agents via YAML-defined flows. Leverage a core kernel with modules for RAG, planning, and tool integration.

Rapid Agent Development

Clear structure for agent development, reducing boilerplate. The MoFA Stage visual IDE accelerates the entire cycle from creation to debugging.

Rich Agent Hub

Access 100+ pre-built agents covering data connectors, LLM integrations, and specialized tools.

Highly Extensible

Easily write custom Python agents. Integrate third-party tools, models, and data sources through well-defined interfaces.

MoFA Stage IDE

A visual management platform for MoFA - your web-based IDE.

  • Visual Agent Management
  • Integrated Terminal
  • Monaco Code Editor

Get Started in Seconds

1

Install MoFA

Run the pip command to install the MoFA framework.

pip install mofa
2

Create Your Agent

Use our templates or start from scratch with simple YAML configs.

3

Deploy & Scale

Launch your AI agents and scale them across different environments.

Manager Agent
Researcher
Searches web for latest data
Writer
Drafts content based on research
Critic
Reviews and requests changes
